welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dilovasi, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport serves all international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport serves all domestic flights within Turkey.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cengiz Topel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cengiz Topel Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
